thread.title: Blues forward Stastny out at least 5 weeks with broken foot
thread.title_full: Blues forward Stastny out at least 5 weeks with broken foot

author: Murder charge in road-rage killing of girl, 4
title: Blues forward Stastny out at least 5 weeks with broken foot
text:
Blues forward Stastny out at least 5 weeks with broken foot Associated Press 23 hrs ago Â© Provided by Associated Press St. Louis Blues' Paul Stastny (26) scores a goal on Edmonton Oilers goalie Cam Talbot (33) during the third period of an NHL hockey game Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in Edmonton, Alberta. (Jason Franson/The Canadian Press via AP) ST. LOUIS (AP) St. Louis Blues forward Paul Stastny will be sidelined at least five weeks with a broken right foot.
AdChoices The 29-year-old Stastny was injured in the second period of a 4-3 victory in Vancouver on Friday. He has a goal, four assists and a plus-four rating in five games.
The team placed Stastny on injured reserve Wednesday and said the injury will be re-evaluated in five weeks.
Stastny was hampered by a shoulder injury last season, his first with the Blues. He had 46 points in 74 games.
